actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title IV of the Social Security Act to establish AFDC minimum payment standards.
short_title: Minimum Benefit for Families Act of 1991

summary.text: Minimum Benefit for Families Act of 1991 - Amends part A (Aid to Families with Dependent Children) (AFDC) of title IV of the Social Security Act to establish minimum AFDC payment standards for State plans under which AFDC payments, when combined with food stamp benefits, must at least equal 50 percent of the applicable poverty level for the size of the family involved.

titles.title: Minimum Benefit for Families Act of 1991
A bill to amend title IV of the Social Security Act to establish AFDC minimum payment standards.
